database.name: VIEW GBG_REQUISITION_V
database.view: ( SELECT MR.M_REQUISITION_ID AS GBG_REQUISITION_V_ID, MR.AD_CLIENT_ID, MR.AD_ORG_ID, MR.CREATED, MR.CREATEDBY, MR.UPDATED, MR.UPDATEDBY, MR.ISACTIVE, MR.M_REQUISITION_ID, BUD.C_BUDGET_ID, MR.C_BPARTNER_ID FROM M_REQUISITION MR, C_BUDGET BUD WHERE MR.EM_GBG_BUDGET_ID = BUD.C_BUDGET_ID)
